title: How does technology help provide learning experience to students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology is one of the significant driving force towards transforming education digitally and leveraging learning for students. Technology is many forms and importantly mobile technology is significantly helping students to improve their learning experience. Digital learning or learning through mobile devices is fast replacing the conventional form of learning. Educational organizations are increasingly introducing mobile devices like Tablets, Laptops, Notebooks etc to the classroom, which are helping students to learn in and beyond the classroom premises both. Also with cloud technologies like mobile device management for education, secure deployment and remote management of students learning devices has become easy. Technology provides many benefits to improve learning- Empowers students with the benefits of advanced technologiesAdds flexibilityImproves efficiency and productivityHelps to explore, ideate and learn scientificallyWidens the scope of learningSimplifies remote education or learning for both students and teachersAdds a fun and interesting way of learning and teachingFollowing are some more technologies that are trending and transforming education- AR and VR technology in the classroom for immersive learningInternet of ThingsGamification for interactive learningArtificial Intelligence technologyYou can read this to know more Technology in the Classroom: Education Industry Trends in 2020

In the 1990s, I helped on a grant to build a community building in a rural county with a small auditorium equipped with cameras and projectors to facilitate tele-courses taught through a dedicated phone line by a lecturer in a distant locations. Internet technology has rendered this facility obsolete, but I was taken with the name: Windows on the World. Instead of just reading a dry textbook, students can find videos and illustrations about the topic. It’s easy to teleconference with a distant teacher. Even elementary school classes can “visit” with a similar class on another continent. Computers and the internet have opened an window on the world. Make the most of it!
